body:
I'm not sure if this can guarantee to always select the "right" team... as far as I remember, `team` (hopefully) does not have a default scope.

What would be the team you want to retrieve here? The "current" one as in the one active in this current season? Why not use
```ruby
teams.in_current_season.last if student?
```
